text: @SaraCarterDC I just dont understand why @NYGovCuomo is Calling Coronavirus A 'European Virus' did he just start a War with the European Union or maybe his home Country Italy? Here same help Cuomo use the "Bacon's Law" Six Degrees of separation-this will help you on were the Virus started!
